### Create the Hadoop User #hdfs:x:458:409:Hadoop HDFS:/home/hadoop:/bin/bash #mapred:x:461:461:Hadoop MapReduce:/usr/lib/hadoop-0.20:/bin/bash
/usr/sbin/groupadd -g 409 hadoop /usr/sbin/groupadd -g 461 mapred /usr/sbin/useradd -u 458 -g 409 -c "Hadoop HDFS" -s /bin/bash -d /home/hadoop -m -k /etc/skel hdfs /usr/sbin/useradd -u 461 -g 461 -c "Hadoop MapReduce" -s /bin/bash -d /usr/lib/hadoop-0.20 mapred
yum install hadoop-0.20-osg >> /root/yum-install.log 2>&1
